mapper.sql: ACCT_ID, ENT_ID, LOGIN_SOURCE, ACCT_TITLE, ACCT_PASSWORD, ACCT_CODE, NAME, DEPT, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_DELETE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, STATUS, START_TIME, ENT_TIME, A_COMPANY_ID,O_INFO_ID,O_INFO_NAME,ACCT_TYPE
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ACCT_INFO.nextval AS acctId FROM dual
insert into acct_info (ACCT_ID, ENT_ID, LOGIN_SOURCE, ACCT_TITLE, ACCT_PASSWORD, ACCT_CODE, NAME, DEPT, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_DELETE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, STATUS, START_TIME, ENT_TIME, A_COMPANY_ID,O_INFO_ID) values (#{acctId}, #{entId}, #{loginSource}, #{acctTitle}, #{acctPassword}, #{acctCode}, #{name}, #{dept}, #{mobilePhone}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{isDelete}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{entTime}, #{aCompanyId},#{oInfoId})

SELECT SEQ_ACCT_INFO.nextval AS acctId FROM dual

ACCT_ID,

acct_type,

mapper.update:
update acct_info
ENT_ID = #{entId},
LOGIN_SOURCE = #{loginSource},
ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle},
ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword},
ACCT_CODE = #{acctCode},
NAME = #{name},
DEPT = #{dept},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone},
EMAIL = #{email},
REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime},
STATUS = #{status},
START_TIME = #{startTime},
ENT_TIME = #{entTime},
A_COMPANY_ID = #{aCompanyId},
O_INFO_ID = #{oInfoId},
ACCT_TYPE = #{acctType},
where ACCT_ID = #{acctId}

update acct_info set ENT_ID = #{entId}, LOGIN_SOURCE = #{loginSource}, ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle}, ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword}, ACCT_CODE = #{acctCode}, NAME = #{name}, DEPT = #{dept}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone}, EMAIL = #{email}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime}, STATUS = #{status}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, ENT_TIME = #{entTime}, A_COMPANY_ID = #{aCompanyId}, O_INFO_ID = #{oInfoId}, where ACCT_ID = #{acctId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM role_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real b ON a.ROLE_ID =b.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN acct_info c ON c.ACCT_ID =b.ACCT_ID WHERE b.ACCT_ID = #{acctId} and ORG_ID = #{orgId} and c.is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update acct_info set ENT_ID = #{entId}, LOGIN_SOURCE = #{loginSource}, ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle}, ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword}, ACCT_CODE = #{acctCode}, NAME = #{name}, DEPT = #{dept}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone}, EMAIL = #{email}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime}, STATUS = #{status}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, ENT_TIME = #{entTime}, A_COMPANY_ID = #{aCompanyId}, O_INFO_ID = #{oInfoId} where ACCT_ID = #{acctId}

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(O_INFO_ID) FROM acct_info WHERE 1 = 1 and is_delete = 0 AND O_INFO_ID IN
#{list}
SELECT O_INFO_ID FROM acct_info WHERE ACCT_ID = #{acctId}
SELECT * FROM acct_info WHERE ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle} and ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword} and is_delete = 0s

select * from acct_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real arr on arr.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.ROLE_ID=arr.ROLE_ID where r.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and arr.ROLE_ID is not null and a.is_delete = 0

select a.acct_id,r.ROLE_TITLE,a.ACCT_TITLE from acct_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real arr on arr.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.ROLE_ID=arr.ROLE_ID where arr.ROLE_ID is not null and a.O_INFO_ID=#{orgId} and a.IS_DELETE = 0 and r.ROLE_ID in (select r.ROLE_ID from role_info r LEFT JOIN acct_role_purchase arp on arp.role_id=r.ROLE_ID where r.IS_DELETE = 0 and r.STATUS=1 and r.ORG_ID=#{orgId} and arp.PURCHASE_TYPE=#{purchaseType} and arp.role_id is not null ) AND a.ACCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{acctTitle} ||'%'

select
from acct_info where ACCT_TITLE = #{acctId} and IS_DELETE = 0 and STATUS = 1

select
from acct_info where ACCT_ID = #{acctId} and IS_DELETE = 0 and STATUS = 1

select ACCT_ID, ENT_ID, LOGIN_SOURCE, ACCT_TITLE, ACCT_PASSWORD, ACCT_CODE, NAME, DEPT, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_DELETE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, STATUS, START_TIME, ENT_TIME, A_COMPANY_ID,O_INFO_ID,O_INFO_NAME,ACCT_TYPE from acct_info
AND ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle}

select
from acct_info where 1 = 1 and (ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle} or MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone} or EMAIL = #{email} ) and (is_delete = 0 and status = 1)
